content: I'm roughly 40% finished with the German translation. I hope to finish it in a week (it's quite a lot of work).

I noticed a mistake in the German survey that I had missed before. In the English survey, people who answer that they still use the 2015 edition (or don't know which edition they use) are redirected from section 5 directly to section 7; they don't get to see section 6. However, this was not configured correctly in the German survey, so people who answered that they use the 2015 edition still filled out section 6.

Not sure if this is a problem, I'm mentioning this just in case.
